content: Our Certifier Type values are "CERTIFYING PHYSICIAN/APRN/PA" versus "PHYSICIAN" and "MEDICAL EXAMINER" versus "MEDICAL EXAMINER/CORONER". Reporting differences in data for feedback.

Available codes in current VS are: https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?id=1A195A5D-F911-46C6-A58B-4146B722BAB0

Coronor, Medical Examiner, Other, Physician Certified and Pronounced, PHysician Certified

Either the current valueset needs to be modified to include the values used by NH or NH has to use the code "OTH" and specify the certifier type using the text property of the codeableConcept datatype.
@AbdulMalik Shakir @Saul Kravitz I am taking this back to review. We are o.k. for the testing, will need to discuss with you on valueset modifications later.
Catherine Cheney has marked this topic as resolved.
